S04bsu040_u:2: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmānupaliḥ pratisaṃlayanāta vyutthāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu040_u:3: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikāntaṃ nyasīdat /
S04bsu040_u:5: iha bhagavanmamaikākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīna cittasyāyamevaṃrupaścetasi cetaḥparivitarka udapādi /
S04bsu040_u:6: prātimokṣasaṃvaro bhagavatā prajñaptaścādhiśīlaśikṣā pariśuddhiḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānām ca /
S04bsu040_u:7: bodhisatvāyānikānāṃ tu bhagavatā jīvitaparityāge 'pi śikṣāpyatra parideśitā nirdiṣṭā /
S04bsu040_u:8: tat kathaṃ bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya tiṣṭhato vā śrāvakayānikānāṃ prātimokṣasaṃvaro vaktavyaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:12_0: tasya me bhagavan vijñāpayatūpāyakauśalyaṃ samprakāśayatu bhagavan yathā bhagavataḥ
S04bsu040_u:12_1: sakāśāt sammukhaṃ śrutvā sammukhaṃ pratigṛhya vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ parṣatsu vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeyam /
S04bsu040_u:13: ayaṃ me bhagavannekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasyaivaṃrupaścetasi cetaḥ parivitarka udapādi yattvahaṃ bhagavantamusaṃkramya vinayaviniścayaṃ paripṛccheyamiti /
S04bsu040_u:14: tat sādhu bhagavan vyākarotu tathāgato vinayaviniścayaṃ vistareṇa mahatī bhikṣuparṣata sannipatitā bodhisattvaparṣacca /
S04bsu040_u:16: tasmāttarhitvamupāle anyena prayogeṇānyenādhyāśayena śrāvakayānikānāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ vada /
S04bsu040_u:21: tatropāleyā śrāvakayānikasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā mahāyānikasya bodhisattvasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
S04bsu040_u:22: yā mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
S04bsu040_u:25: iyaṃ śrāvakayānikasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā mahāyānikasya bodhisatvasyā pariśuddhaśīlata paramadauḥ śīlyañca /
S04bsu040_u:26: katamopāle mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā yā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśilyañca /
S04bsu040_u:27: ihopāle mahāyāne samprasthito bodhisattvo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān bhavopapattiṃ parigṛṇhāti aparikhinnacitto 'parikhinnamānasaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:28: iyaṃ mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
S04bsu040_u:29: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle sānurakṣāṃ śikṣāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vada /
S04bsu040_u:35: kathaṃ copāle sānurakṣā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ niranurakṣā śikṣā śrāvaka yānikānām /
S04bsu040_u:36: ihopāle mahāyāna saṃprasthitena bodhisattvena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ hitamanuvartitavyaṃ na punaḥ śrāvakayānikena /
S04bsu040_u:37: anenopāle paryyāyeṇa sānurakṣā śikṣā mahāyānikānām bodhisattvānāṃ niranurakṣā śikṣā śrāvakayānikānām /
S04bsu040_u:38: kathaṃ copāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasamprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ niḥ parihārāśikṣā śrāvakayānikānām /
S04bsu040_u:39: ihopāle mahānasaṃprasthitobodhisattvo 'pi saceta pūrvvāṇhasamaye āpattimāpadyeta madhyānhakāle sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:43: sacet sāyānhasamaey āpattimāpadyeta rātryāḥ purimayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:45: sacet rātryāḥ purimayāme āpattimāpadyeta rātryāśca madhyamayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:47: sacet rātryā madhyamayāme āpattimāpadyeta rātryāśca paścimayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:49: evaṃ hyupāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ /
S04bsu040_u:50: tatra bodhisattvena nātra kaukṛtyaparyyutthānamutpādyaṃ nātivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
S04bsu040_u:51: tatropāle sacecchrāvakayānikaḥ punaḥ punarāpattimāpadyeta naṣṭaḥ śrāvakayānikasya śīlaskandho veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:53: ādīpta śiraścailopamena hi śrāvakayānikena bhavitavyaṃ sarvakleśaprahāṇāya /
S04bsu040_u:54: evaṃ niḥparihārā śikṣā śrāvakayānikasya hyupāle parinirvvāṇakāmasya /
S04bsu040_u:55: katham copāle dūrānupraviṣṭā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvnāṃ sāvadānā śikṣā śrāvakayānikānāṃ /
S04bsu040_u:56: ihopāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍitvā ramitvā paricārayitvā bodhicittaṃ notsṛjati /
S04bsu040_u:59: bhaviṣyatyupāle sa kālaḥ sa samayo yanmahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvastenaiva bodhicittena suparigṛhītena svapnāntaragato 'pi sarvvakleśairnna saṃhariṣyate /
S04bsu040_u:60: api ca mahāyānasaṃprasthitena bodhisattvena naikasminneva bhave sarvvakleśāḥ kṣapayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu040_u:62: paripakvakuśalamūlena ca śrāvakayānikenādīptaśi śacailopamena hi tatkṣaṇikokapi bhavopapattirnnotpāditavyā /
S04bsu040_u:63: evamupāle dūrānupraviṣṭā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sāvadānāṃ śikṣā śrāvakayānikānām //
S04bsu040_u:64: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle sānurakṣāṃ saparihārāṃ dūrānupraviṣṭāṃ śikṣāṃ mahāyānasamprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vada /
S04bsu040_u:65: niranurakṣāṃ niḥparihārām sāvadānāṃ śikṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ vada /
S04bsu040_u:67: mahāsaṃbhārā hyupāle 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirna sukarā ekāntaniviṣṭena mahāyānasaṃprasthitena bodhisattvenā prameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃdhārayituṃ saṃsarituma /
S04bsu040_u:68_0: idaṃ copāle 'rthavaśaṃ sampaśyan tathāgataḥ samyaksambuddho mahāyānāsaṃprasthitānāṃ
S04bsu040_u:68_1: bodhisattvnāṃ naikāntanirvvedakathāṃ kathayati naikāntavirāgakathāṃ kathayati naikāntavirāgakathāṃ
S04bsu040_u:69: api tu khalu punaḥ prītikathāṃ prāmodyakathām pratityasamutpādasamprayuktakathāṃ kathayati /
S04bsu040_u:73: ta imāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā 'bhiratāḥ saṃprāptā na parikhidyante bodhisambhārañca paripūrayanti /
S04bsu040_u:75: yā imā bhagavannāpattayaḥ kāścidrāgasaṃyuktāḥ kāścit dveṣāsaṃyuktāḥ kāścinmohasaṃyuktāḥ /
S04bsu040_u:76: tatra katamā bhagavan mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya gurutarā āpattayaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:77: kiṃ rāgasaṃprayuktā utāho dveṣasaṃprayuktāḥ utāho mohasaṃprayuktāḥ /
S04bsu040_u:79_0: sacedupāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā rāgasaṃprayuktā āpattīrāpadyeta
S04bsu040_u:80: tat kasmāddhetordveṣa upāle sattvaparityāgāya saṃvarttate rāgaḥ sattvasaṃgrahāya saṃvarttate iti /
S04bsu040_u:81: tatropāle yaḥ kleśaḥ sattvasaṃgrahāya saṃvarttate tatra bodhisattvasya na chalaṃ na bhayam /
S04bsu040_u:82: yaḥ kleśaḥ sattvaparityāgāya saṃvarttate tatra bodhisattvasya chalañca bhayañca /
S04bsu040_u:83: api tūpāle uktam pūrvvameva rāgo bandhavirāgo 'lpasāvadyo dveṣah kṣipravirāgo mahāsāvadyaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:85: yaḥ kṣipravirāgo mahāsāvadyaḥ kleśaḥ sa bodhisattvasya svapnāntaragatasyāpi naiva yuktaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:86: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle bodhisattvānaṃ yāḥ kāścid rāgasaṃprayuktā āpattayaḥ sarvvāstā anāpattaya iti dhāraya /
S04bsu040_u:87: tatropāle ye 'nupāyakuśalā bodhisattvāste rāgasaṃprayuktābhya āpatibhyo vibhyati na dveṣasamprayuktābhyaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:88: ye punarupāyakuśalā bodhisattvāste dveṣasaṃprayuktābhya āpattibhyo vibhyati na rāgasamprayuktābhyaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:89: atha khalu te tasyāmeva parṣadi mañjuśrīkumarabhūtaḥ sannipatito 'bhūt /
S04bsu040_u:94: ātyantavinītān sarvvadharmān jānīyustadapi na bhūyastathāgato vinayaḥ prajñāpyeta /
